data.enText: moving pictures
movie
a series of moving pictures recorded with sound that tells a story, shown on television or at the cinema/movie theater
Let's go to the cinema─ there's a good film on this week.
data.chText: 咱们去看电影吧，本周在上映一部好片子。

data.enText: Let's stay in and watch a film .
data.chText: 咱们待在家里看电影吧。

data.enText: a horror/documentary/feature film
data.chText: 恐怖 / 纪录 / 故事片

data.enText: a silent film (= one recorded without sound)
an international film festival
a film crew/critic/director/producer
data.chText: 电影摄制组 / 评论家 / 导演 / 制作人

data.enText: the film version of the novel
data.chText: 由同名小说改编的电影版本

data.enText: to make/shoot a film
the movies
the cinema
the art or business of making films/movies
to study film and photography
the film industry
moving pictures of real events, shown for example on television
television news film of the riots
data.chText: 这场暴乱的电视新闻片

data.enText: The accident was captured/caught on film .
in cameras
thin plastic that is sensitive to light, used for taking photographs and making films/movies; a roll of this plastic, used in cameras
a roll of film
a 35mm film
She put a new film in her camera.
data.chText: 她在相机里装上新胶卷。

data.enText: to have a film developed
thin layer
a thin layer of sth, usually on the surface of sth else
Everything was covered in a film of dust.
data.chText: 所有的东西都蒙上了一层灰尘。

data.enText: to make a film/movie of a story or a real event
They are filming in Moscow right now.
data.chText: 目前他们正在莫斯科拍电影。

data.enText: The show was filmed on location in New York.
data.chText: 这次演出在纽约现场拍了影片。

data.enText: Two young boys were filmed stealing CDs on the security video.
data.chText: 两个少年偷唱片时被保安录像机拍摄了下来。

data.enText: Filming was delayed because of bad weather.
data.chText: 由于天气恶劣拍摄受阻了。

ex.enText: The table was covered by a film of dust.
It can be clearly seen that there is a film of oil on the surface of the water in the cup.
ex.chText: 可以明显地看到杯子里的水上面有一层油。

synonyms.bx: 指某物表面上覆盖的薄薄的一层液体、粉末等。
指某物表面所涂的很薄的一层涂料或其他物质。

ex.enText: There was a thick layer of dust on the furniture.
ex.chText: 家具上蒙了一层厚厚的灰尘。

ex.enText: Why do you wear so many layers of clothing?
ex.chText: 你怎么穿了这么多层衣服啊？

synonyms.bx: 指覆盖在某物表面上或夹在其他两物之间的一层材料或物质，可厚可薄。

ex.enText: The top of the building was hidden beneath a veil of mist.
It was darker outside because the moon was hidden behind a veil of clouds.
ex.chText: 月亮躲在薄薄的云层后面，外面就更黑了。

synonyms.bx: 指使人视线模糊的一层薄薄的雾、云、烟等。

ex.enText: I have seen two good films this week.
ex.chText: 本周我已经看了两部好电影。

ex.enText: I watched a late-night film yesterday at home.
ex.chText: 我昨天在家看了一场午夜电影。

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指电影院中或电视上播放的电影。

ex.enText: Do you want to see a movie/film with me tomorrow?
ex.chText: 你明天想和我一起去看场电影吗？

ex.enText: She is his favourite movie/film star.
ex.chText: 她是他最喜欢的电影明星。

ex.enText: We took the kids to the movies every week.
ex.chText: 我们每周都带孩子们去看电影。

ex.enText: It only happens in the movies.
ex.chText: 这事只有在电影里才会发生。

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指具体的电影作品时与 film 同义，可换用；而 the movies 可指电影院、电影业或电影的总称。

ex.enText: There are many good pictures being shown.
ex.chText: 有多部优秀影片正在上映。

synonyms.bx: 作“电影”解时与 film 和 movie 同义，但不常用；而 the pictures 仅指电影院，且多用于英国英语。

example: the table was covered with a film of dust

tr: photographic material consisting of a base of celluloid covered with a photographic emulsion
used to make negatives or transparencies
a thin sheet of (usually plastic and usually transparent) material used to wrap or cover things
a medium that disseminates moving pictures
example: this story would be good cinema

tr: a form of entertainment that enacts a story by sound and a sequence of images giving the illusion of continuous movement
example: they went to a movie every Saturday night
the film was shot on location

tr: make a film or photograph of something

example.ex: Everything about the film was good. Good acting, good story, good fun.
example.tran: 这部片子各个方面都很不错：表演出色，故事精彩，情节有趣。

example.ex: ...a government health film about the dangers of smoking.
example.tran: 有关吸烟危害的公益健康教育影片

value.def: A film consists of moving pictures that have been recorded so that they can be shown at the cinema or on television. A film tells a story, or shows a real situation.

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用movie

example.ex: He had filmed her life story...
example.tran: 他把她一生的经历拍成了电影。

example.ex: Considering the restrictions under which she filmed, I think she did a commendable job.
example.tran: 考虑到她拍摄时所受的各种限制，我觉得她交出的答卷值得嘉许。

value.def: If you film something, you use a camera to take moving pictures which can be shown on a screen or on television.
value.tran: 拍摄;把…拍成电影(或电视)

example.ex: They have seen news film of families queueing in Russia to buy a loaf of bread.
example.tran: 他们已经看过那段俄罗斯许多家庭为买面包排起长队的新闻画面。

value.def: Film of something is moving pictures of a real event that are shown on television or on a screen.

example.ex: The photographers had already shot a dozen rolls of film.
example.tran: 摄影师们已经拍光了一打胶卷。

value.def: A film is the narrow roll of plastic that is used in a camera to take photographs.

example.ex: Film is a business with limited opportunities for actresses...
example.tran: 电影行业对女演员来说机会有限。

example.ex: She wanted to set up her own company to invest in films.
example.tran: 她想成立自己的公司投资电影。

value.def: The making of cinema films, considered as a form of art or a business, can be referred to as film or films .

example.ex: The sea is coated with a film of raw sewage.
example.tran: 海面上漂浮着一层未经处理的污水。

value.def: A film of powder, liquid, or oil is a very thin layer of it.

example.ex: Cover with plastic film and refrigerate for 24 hours.
example.tran: 覆上保鲜膜，冷藏 24 小时。

value.def: Plastic film is a very thin sheet of plastic used to wrap and cover things.

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用plastic wrap, Saran wrap
